mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this email finds you well.

Thank you for providing the internal data to update our checklist. I have incorporated the latest information into the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC.

Please find the updated checklist attached for your review. It highlights the validated items, as well as those that are pending further information.

If you have any questions or require additional details, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
Surbhi
